page.title: 03DOMESTIC LIFE
page.content: THE MAJORITY OF CHILDREN LIVING IN HORSFORD AND FELTHORPE DO SO BECAUSE THEIR{PARENTS MOVED THERE AFTER MARRIAGE.ONLY A FEW HAVE GRANDPARENTS LIVING IN THE AREA.THE{AVERAGE NUMBER IN THE FAMILY IS FOUR, CLOSELY FOLLOWED BY FAMILIES WHO HAVE ONE OR THREE CHILDREN.DOMECTIC LIFE CONFORMS TO TRADITIONAL IDEAS. BREAKFAST; (CEREAL, BACON, EGGS, TOAST, JAM, MARMALADE WITH TEA OR COFFEE), IS A GOOD EXAMPLE.PARENTS{OCCUPATIONS}DO NOT DEPEND ON THE LOCAL ENVIRONMENT BUT ARE LARGELY{LOCATED ELSEWHERE, E.G. NURSES OR CLERICAL WORKERS IN NORWICH,PRISON OFFICERS OR OIL RIG WORKERS. SOME MOTHERS DO PART TIME WORK WHILE THEIR CHILDREN ARE AT SCHOOL, SOME DO FULL TIME AND SOME REMAIN AT HOME WITH DOMESTIC WORK,THERE IS A WIDE CHOICE.
